title: Percussion Music Pack
description: Add a percussive, tribal and ethnic vibe to your games with these 16 songs (divided in 101 tracks so you can implement interactive music) that will take the music of your game to new heights at a low price.
longDescription:
Percussion Music Pack

Add a percussive, tribal and ethnic vibe to your games with these 16 songs (divided in 101 tracks so you can implement interactive music) that will take the music of your game to new heights at a low price.

 

YouTube - Listen to a video preview of the songs

Tracklist PDF

 

More about the pack:

- This pack can be complemented with:

Forest Background Music

- The songs on the pack can be used in various situations in the gameplay. There is also a track that you can use for a trailer of your game.

 

[Format]

All files are in:

WAV - Stereo 44.1 Khz, 16bit
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • This music tracks are perfect to set up the tribal vibe to your game
  • With many songs on the pack there’s included a version without loop, this way you can use the tracks in your promotional videos and it will be easy to edit
  • You can use the track ''Stem_01_Percussion'' of each song to create new songs by your own


Number of Audio Wavs: 101

Number of Audio Cues: 101

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 bit

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 28:07

Documentation: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1axYeTMg1h8uqAsI2jApwJrwKBYEnFCaK/view
